name: Sliding Hero - Alpha Demo
description:
DISCLAIMER
The game is in the early Alpha stage, so game-breaking bugs are expected (but not welcome). Music and sound design will change in upcoming releases.

The demo is around 1-2 hours long.

WHAT IS SLIDING HERO
Sliding Hero is a story-driven explorative puzzle game with unique mechanics: the main character will move in a single direction until hitting an obstacle, changing the way to approach each puzzle.

PLOT
Luca Sicomoro is an Italian noble that finds himself stuck inside a strange cavern. Help him find a way out by solving puzzles and revealing the secret behind the maze.

FEATURES

 - An interconnected world -
The game takes place in a massive interconnected dungeon with multiple rooms (each of them is both a puzzle and a maze).

- Multiple mechanics -
The game features different kinds of puzzles, ranging from Sokoban-inspired pushing to RPG-lite combat.

- Fast-paced puzzle solving -
There are both meditative and action puzzles, as well as boss fights built around the movement mechanic.

UPCOMING FEATURES

Three new kinds of weapons:
A hammer, to push and reposition foes
A dagger, to kill foes before getting hurt
An axe, to reposition Luca around the enemy

WASD to move in the cardinal directions
X to confirm
ESC to open the menu

Gamepad will be implemented soon
